title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 163 - Flexible Rating For Nonbusiness Automobile Insurance Policies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 163 - Flexible Rating For Nonbusiness Automobile Insurance Policies

State Regulations
§ 163.0 - Preamble
§ 163.1 - Definitions
§ 163.2 - Rules and standards governing proposed file and use overall average rate changes for nonbusiness automobile insurance policies
§ 163.3 - Rules and standards governing changes in rating factors
§ 163.4 - Rules and standards governing nonbusiness automobile insurance policy premium change limitations for individual insureds as a consequence of file and use filings
§ 163.5 - Support for filings submitted on a file and use basis
§ 163.6 - Support for filings subject to prior approval
§ 163.7 - Notification to insureds of rate changes
§ 163.8 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 163

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 2350; art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
